text: Baby Blue Marine is a 1976 American World War II drama movie directed by John D. Hancock and produced by Aaron Spelling, Leonard Goldberg. It stars Jan- Michael Vincent, Richard Gere, Bruno Kirby, Art Lund, Adam Arkin, Michael Conrad, Dana Elcar and Allan Miller and was distributed by Columbia Pictures. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1976 drama movies Category:1976 war movies Category:1970s American drama movies Category:American war movies Category:World War II movies Category:Columbia Pictures movies Category:Movies set in California Category:Movies set in the 1940s Category:1970s English- language movies Category:Movies about the United States Marine Corps
title: Baby Blue Marine
